# Input

# Default

Code
<template>
  <Example fullWidth>
    <template #demos>
      <sf-input label="Label" v-model="value"/>
    </template>
  </Example>
</template>


<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
          value: ''
        }
    }
}
</script>

# Placeholder

Code

  <Example fullWidth>
    <template #demos>
      <sf-input placeholder="Type your name" v-model="value"/>
      <sf-input label="Name" placeholder="Type your name..." v-model="value" border/>
    </template>
  </Example>
</template>


<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
          value: ''
        }

</script>

# Masked

CPF

CNPJ

Code
<template>
  <Example fullWidth>
    <template #demos>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="CPF" mask="###.###.###-##" masked v-model="value">
        <template #message>
          {{ value }}
        </template>
      </sf-input>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="CNPJ" mask="##.###.###/####-##" v-model="valueNotMaked">
        <template #message>
          {{ valueNotMaked }}
        </template>
      </sf-input>
    </template>
  </Example>
</template>


<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
          value: null,
          valueNotMaked: ''
        }
    }
}
</script>

# Color

Default

Primary

Success

Warn

Danger

Bordered

Primary

Success

Warn

Danger

Code
<template>
  <Example fullWidth>
    <template #demos>
      <span>Default</span>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="Primary" icon="palette" color="primary" v-model="value"/>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="Success" icon="palette" color="success" v-model="value"/>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="Warn" icon="palette" color="warn" v-model="value"/>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="Danger" icon="palette" color="danger" v-model="value"/>

      <span style="margin-top: 26px">Bordered</span>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="Primary" icon="palette" color="primary" v-model="value" border/>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="Success" icon="palette" color="success" v-model="value" border/>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="Warn" icon="palette" color="warn" v-model="value" border/>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="Danger" icon="palette" color="danger" v-model="value" border/>
    </template>
  </Example>
</template>


<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
          value: ''
        }
    }
}
</script>

# Message

Default

Message

Input your e-mail
Color

Primary Message

You message here

Success Message

Valid

Warn Message

Insecure password

Danger Message

Required
Code
<template>
  <Example fullWidth>
    <template #demos>
      <span>Default</span>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="Message" type="email" v-model="value">
        <template #message>
          Input your e-mail
        </template>
      </sf-input>

      <span style="margin-top: 26px">Color</span>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="Primary Message" icon="send" v-model="value">
        <template #message-primary>
          You message here
        </template>
      </sf-input>

      <sf-input label-placeholder="Success Message" icon="check-all" v-model="value">
        <template #message-success>
          Valid
        </template>
      </sf-input>

      <sf-input label-placeholder="Warn Message" icon="alert-outline" v-model="value">
        <template #message-warn>
          Insecure password
        </template>
      </sf-input>

      <sf-input label-placeholder="Danger Message" icon="alert-circle-outline" v-model="value">
        <template #message-danger>
          Required
        </template>
      </sf-input>
    </template>
  </Example>
</template>


<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
          value: ''
        }
    }
}
</script>

# Input Type

Password

Weak

Search

Number

Tel

Code
<template>
  <Example fullWidth>
    <template #demos>
      </sf-input>
        <sf-input label-placeholder="Password" type="password" icon="dots-horizontal" v-model="valuePassword" border>
        <template :slot="messageType">
          {{ messagePassword }}
        </template>
      </sf-input>

      <sf-input label-placeholder="Search" type="search" v-model="valueSearch" icon="eraser"/>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="Number" type="number" :min="0" :max="10" icon="numeric" v-model="valueNumber"/>
      <sf-input label-placeholder="Tel" type="tel" :mask="['(##) #####-####', '(##) ####-####']" icon="phone" v-model="valuePhone"/>
    </template>
  </Example>
</template>


<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
          valuePassword: '',
          valueSearch: '',
          valueNumber: '',
          valuePhone: ''
        }
    },
    computed: {
      messagePassword() {
        let value = this.valuePassword.length
        switch(true) {
          case (value < 4):
            return 'Weak'
          case (value < 8):
            return 'Good'
          default:
            return 'Strong'
        }
      },
      messageType() {
        let value = this.valuePassword.length
        switch(true) {
          case (value < 4):
            return 'message-danger'
          case (value < 8):
            return 'message-warn'
          default:
            return 'message-success'
        }
      }
    }
}
</script>
